title: ARiViT: attention-based residual-integrated vision transformer for noisy brain medical image classification

abstract: Brain tumor detection in medical image processing presents a formidable challenge due to the complex behavior exhibited by these tumors. Their intricate nature arises from a variety of shapes and textures within brain tumor images, exacerbated by their …

abstract: Since the start of 2020, the global community has been shocked by the coronavirus disease (COVID-19). The most popular method for diagnosing COVID-19 is RTPCR testing, which is very time-consuming and requires isolating environment. On the …
